name: Talo
appearance: Compact and quick, brine-scented coat, mirrored tray always under one arm, ink-stained fingertips from tallying flame counts.
character: Nervy, earnest clerk-marshal who believes process can save the city if enforced cleanly.
talents: catches forged moon-flames by scent alone
maps conspirators by who avoids his eyes
keeps order with a single whistle and tray rap
dreams: expose the mirror-passage without collapsing talks with the Rookery
codify lamp-carry rules no guild can twist
secrets: Burned his palm on a backward-burning fake stored by Parliamentors
Keeps a private ledger of who tries to bribe him
Once delayed a vote to save a child lost below the galleries
